<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Priya and Sneha are happily married for 12 years.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Priya a :Person ;
    :name "Priya" ;
    :spouse :Sneha .

:Sneha a :Person ;
    :name "Sneha" ;
    :spouse :Priya .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Sometimes Rohan and Ananya take separate vacations.  They feel it's ok to have alone time in a relationship.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Rohan a :Person ;
    :name "Rohan" ;
    :partner :Ananya .

:Ananya a :Person ;
    :name "Ananya" ;
    :partner :Rohan .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Sakura introduced his twin siblings, Yuto and Hana. Despite being twins, they couldn't be more different - Yuto is a bookworm while Hana is a sports enthusiast.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Sakura a :Person ;
    :name "Sakura" ;
    :sibling :Yuto, :Hana .

:Yuto a :Person ;
    :name "Yuto" ;
    :sibling :Sakura, :Hana .

:Hana a :Person ;
    :name "Hana" ;
    :sibling :Sakura, :Yuto .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Despite occasional disagreements, Yui and Hana always had each other's backs when it truly matters, that's just the kind of siblings they were.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Yui a :Person ;
    :name "Yui" ;
    :sibling :Hana .

:Hana a :Person ;
    :name "Hana" ;
    :sibling :Yui .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Growing up, Mehmet and his sister Emine shared countless adventures, from building pillow forts to exploring the woods behind their house, forging memories that would last a lifetime.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Mehmet a :Person ;
    :name "Mehmet" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Emine .

:Emine a :Person ;
    :name "Emine" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Mehmet .</s>
